$ tox -epy27 nova.tests.test_wsgi.TestWSGIServerWithSSL.test_app_using_ipv6_and_ssl

my distro is ubuntu11.10 and ubuntu12.04 x86_64.

i want to know which package is related
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yilongx-y-sun

comments.content: it failes due to test methed "nova.tests.test_wsgi.TestWSGIServerWithSSL.test_app_using_ipv6_and_ssl  " of module  "nova/nova/tests/test_wsgi.py", when we delete this file everything is ok
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yilongx-y-sun

comments.content: whether it has relation with proxy ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yilongx-y-sun

comments.content: do you set proxy?    i run you given command and get the same error message.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yilongx-y-sun

comments.content: i have worked it out. Thanks guys
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yilongx-y-sun

comments.content: it caused by http proxy, so we should unset it
